javaslang.algebra

Interface Monad1<T1,M extends HigherKinded1<?,M>>

  • Type Parameters:
    T1 - 1st component type of this monad
    M - placeholder for the type that implements this
    All Superinterfaces:
    Functor1<T1>, HigherKinded1<T1,M>
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    Arbitrary<T>, Gen<T>, List<T>, Option<T>, Seq<T>, Stream<T>, Traversable<T>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    List.AbstractList, List.Cons, List.Nil, None, Some, Stream.AbstractStream, Stream.Cons, Stream.Deferred, Stream.Nil, Tuple1

    public interface Monad1<T1,M extends HigherKinded1<?,M>>
extends Functor1<T1>, HigherKinded1<T1,M>
    Defines a 1-ary Monad by generalizing the flatMap function.

    All instances of the Monad1 interface should obey the three control laws:

    • Left identity: unit(a).flatMap(f) ≡ f a
    • Right identity: m.flatMap(unit) ≡ m
    • Associativity: m.flatMap(f).flatMap(g) ≡ m.flatMap(x -> f.apply(x).flatMap(g)
    given
    • an object m of type HigherKinded1<T1, M>
    • an object a consisting of values of type T1
    • a constructor unit taking an a and producing an object of type M
    • a function f: T1 → M
    To read further about monads in Java please refer to What's Wrong in Java 8, Part IV: Monads.
    Since:
    1.1.0

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      <U1,MONAD extends HigherKinded1<U1,M>>
      Monad1<U1,M>      		 flatMap(Function1<? super T1,MONAD> f)
      Returns the result of applying f to M's value of type T1,…,T1 and returns a new M with value of type U1,…,U1.
      <U1> Monad1<U1,M> map(Function1<? super T1,? extends U1> f)
      Applies a function f to the components of this Functor.

        Returns the result of applying f to M's value of type T1,…,T1 and returns a new M with value of type U1,…,U1.
        Type Parameters:
        U1 - 1st component type of this monad
        MONAD - placeholder for the monad type of component types T1,…,T1 and container type M
        Parameters:
        f - a function that maps the monad values to a new monad instance
        Returns:
        a new Monad1 instance of component types U1,…,U1 and container type M
